channel.title: Node Upgrade Process on
channel.description: Recent content in Node Upgrade Process on

item.title: Node Behavior When Port 443 is blocked
item.description: Symptoms Node will not update either automatically or when manually triggered Node will not be able to pull down container images from the organization repository Node cannot send up debug logs Cause The Trustgrid node cannot connect to repo.trustgrid.io on port 443 to update packages Troubleshooting Connectivity Either of the below methods can be used to verify connectivity: Use the Interface TCP Port Test tool. Make sure the WAN interfaces IP is the source, repo.
